name: autoconf-archive
description:
The GNU Autoconf Archive is a collection of more than 500 macros for GNU
Autoconf.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependent_to.name: silo
dependent_to.description:
Silo is a library for reading and writing a wide variety of scientific
data to binary, disk files.

dependent_to.name: nix
dependent_to.description: Nix, the purely functional package manager

dependent_to.name: mpfr
dependent_to.description:
The MPFR library is a C library for multiple-precision floating-point
computations with correct rounding.

dependent_to.name: tpm2-tss
dependent_to.description: OSS implementation of the TCG TPM2 Software Stack (TSS2)

dependent_to.name: mdsplus
dependent_to.description:
A set of software tools for data acquisition and storage and a
methodology for management of complex scientific data.
